urls.title: Food & Beverage (Menu) - Go First
urls.description: Satisfy those cravings in-flight, by simply pre-booking your favourite snacks online or choose from our onboard refreshed menu. You can pick from an array of veg, non-veg, and Jain snacks to please your taste buds. Go First accepts credit/debit card payments on all domestic and international flights for on-board meal purchases. Please note that Diners Club and Amex cards are not accepted. Cash transactions are not applicable on international flights. Go First has added Raj Uphaar’s Raj Amrut rice chakri,

data.text:
Take a flight to #Jaipur from #Bengaluru or #Mumbai & explore the beautiful city.
Book now - https://t.co/lpFpoLXi8t

From the beautiful architecture of Patrika Gate to artistic style elements of Amer Fort, from the natural springs of Galtaji Temple to breathtaking views from Nahargarh Fort and of course, the Indo-Saracenic architecture of Jal Mahal Palace, Jaipur is a majestic place to visit! https://t.co/1JltabCSlm

urls.title: Life Insurance - Go First
urls.description: Celebrate a secure life with a life insurance policy. With Go First, now you can buy a life insurance policy to secure the future of your loved ones. a 4G plan that safeguards all the generations of your family with the 1 st G being you, 2 nd G - your children, 3 rd G - your parents, along with offering you the 4 th G of Guaranteed* life-long income. During these tough times of COVID-19, Flexi Term Pro secures you against unfortunate events and offers you a higher sum assured with premiums as low as ₹9.18

entity.name: Indian Independence Day
entity.description: Annual celebration of India's independence from British rule. Photo via @GettyImages.

data.text:
The Taste of Freedom! 🇮🇳 
On the occasion of #India's Independence anniversary, passengers at #GOFIRST were treated to a delicious tri-colour pastry by the crew. 
We thank all our passengers for choosing to fly with us today & we look forward to serving you again soon.
@MoCA_GoI https://t.co/k5Vp4xC1yO
